scripts.bootstrap: f () { npm ci && lerna link && lerna bootstrap --ci --hoist --strict && lerna link && npm run build:travis && npm run install:qa ;}; f
scripts.build: f () { lerna exec --scope=@deriv/${1:-'*'} -- npm run build $2 ;}; f
scripts.build:publish: f () { lerna exec --scope=@deriv/${1:-'*'} -- npm run build:publish $2 ;}; f
scripts.build:dashboard: export IS_DASHBOARD=true && npm run build && export IS_DASHBOARD=
scripts.build:local: f () { lerna exec --scope @deriv/trader --scope @deriv/bot-web-ui --parallel -- npm run build $1 ;}; f
scripts.build:prod: export NODE_ENV=staging && npm run build && export NODE_ENV=
scripts.build:gh-pages: f () { lerna exec --scope @deriv/components --scope @deriv/p2p -- npm run build && lerna exec --scope @deriv/cashier --scope @deriv/account -- npm run build $1 && npm run build:local $1 ;}; f
scripts.clean: echo "Remove $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/node_modules" && lerna clean && rm -rf "$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/node_modules"
scripts.deploy: f () { npm run build:travis && npm run build:local && lerna exec --scope @deriv/core -- npm run deploy $@ ;}; f
scripts.deploy:clean: f () { npm run build:travis && npm run build:local && lerna exec --scope @deriv/core -- npm run deploy:clean $@ ;}; f
scripts.deploy:folder: f () { export NODE_ENV=staging && npm run build:gh-pages $1 && lerna exec --scope @deriv/core -- npm run deploy:folder $@ && export NODE_ENV= ;}; f
scripts.install:qa: npm --prefix ./e2e_tests ci && echo "IMPORTANT: copy .env.example to .env and update the values for development."
scripts.publish_package: f () { lerna exec --scope=@deriv/${1:-'*'} -- npm run publish_package $2 ;}; f
scripts.serve: f () { lerna exec --scope=@deriv/${1:-'*'} -- npm run serve $npm_config_open;}; f
scripts.start: f () { lerna exec --scope=@deriv/${1:-'*'} -- npm run start ;}; f
scripts.test: f () { bash ./scripts/circleci-config.test.sh && npm run test:typecheck && npm run test:stylelint  && npm run test:eslint && npm run test:jest ;}; f
scripts.test:eslint: f () { lerna exec --scope=@deriv/${1:-'*'} -- npm run test:eslint $2;}; f
scripts.test:mocha: f () { lerna exec --scope=@deriv/${1:-'*'} -- npm run test:mocha ;}; f
scripts.translate: f () { lerna exec --scope @deriv/translations -- npm run translate ;}; f
